<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.UpdateSetPreviewVisible</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Used by Update Set Preview UI Action and Notice business rule</description> <name>UpdateSetPreviewVisible</name> <script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetPreviewVisible = Class.create(); UpdateSetPreviewVisible.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractUpdateUIActionUtil, { initialize: function() { },
_userHasAccess: function(gr) { var delegatedDevAccess = SNC.UpdateSetAccessUtil.checkDelegatedDeveloperAccessToHierarchy(gr.sys_id); return (delegatedDevAccess && (gr.state == 'loaded' || gr.state == 'backedout') && gr.remote_base_update_set.nil() && this._isCurrentDomainSafe() && gr.canWrite()); },
type: 'UpdateSetPreviewVisible' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-09-29 14:00:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0fc79b9747c22200a03a19fbac9a71c3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>UpdateSetPreviewVisible</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System Update Sets Preview" source="com.glide.system_update_set_preview">58bdbc0b6d2220100acb70b3534330f8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0fc79b9747c22200a03a19fbac9a71c3</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-01 22:54:13</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>526</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
